sn41.2:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu macchikasande viharanti ambatakavane.
sn41.2:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn41.2:1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati theranam bhikkhunam adhivasanam viditva utthayasana there bhikkhu abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn41.2:1.6: Atha kho thera bhikkhu tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidimsu.
sn41.2:2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti?
sn41.2:2.4: Evam vutte, ayasma thero tunhi ahosi.
sn41.2:2.5: Dutiyampi kho citto gahapati ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.7: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti?
sn41.2:2.8: Dutiyampi kho ayasma thero tunhi ahosi.
sn41.2:2.9: Tatiyampi kho citto gahapati ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.11: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti?
sn41.2:2.12: Tatiyampi kho ayasma thero tunhi ahosi.
sn41.2:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma isidatto tasmim bhikkhusanghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.2:3.2: Atha kho ayasma isidatto ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.2:3.3: “byakaromaham, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino etam panhan”ti?
sn41.2:3.4: “Byakarohi tvam, avuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino etam panhan”ti.
sn41.2:3.7: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhatunanattam, vuttam bhagavata’”ti?
sn41.2:3.12: Ettavata kho, gahapati, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti.
sn41.2:4.1: Atha kho citto gahapati ayasmato isidattassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva there bhikkhu panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
sn41.2:4.2: Atha kho thera bhikkhu bhuttavino onitapattapanino utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn41.2:4.3: Atha kho ayasma thero ayasmantam isidattam etadavoca:
sn41.2:4.4: “sadhu kho tam, avuso isidatta, eso panho patibhasi, neso panho mam patibhasi.
sn41.2:4.5: Tenahavuso isidatta, yada annathapi evarupo panho agaccheyya, tannevettha patibhaseyya”ti.
